original_title: 見た目がいやらし過ぎて不謹慎な元女教師人妻 宮川ありさ 30歳 AVデビュー！！
overview: Arisa Miyagawa Former teacher. It's been three years since her marriage and she is now a housewife. She found her job as a teacher rewarding, but she had reasons to quit. That's because her appearance is too lewd... She is really a serious and passionate teacher, but she lost her confidence when she was told that her suit, the way she spoke, the way she laughed, and all the gestures were too lewd. She asked, "Is lewdness such a bad thing? Am I really lewd?"
title: An Unrestrained Former Female Teacher Married Woman Who Looks Way To Naughty Arisa Miyakawa 30 Years Old Her AV Debut!!
